sources.title: Girl With Hyacinths (1950) A Mulher com Jacinto
sources.description: AÂ  man investigates the mysterious life of his neighbour who has committed suicide.

metadata.Plot: The young Dagmar Brink commits suicide. Her belongings are inherited by the resident caretaker in the house she lived in. The caretaker, who never knew her, wonders why and make contact with the people who knew her to find out why she killed herself.
metadata.Actors: Eva Henning, Ulf Palme, Birgit Tengroth
